short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your LinkedIn engagement. Get noticed on Social Media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Social Presence Extension is a web extension designed to help professionals grow and maintain engagement on LinkedIn efficiently. This tool allows users to automate essential interactions such as liking and commenting on posts, which can increase visibility and foster stronger connections with their network.

How It Works: Once installed, simply log into LinkedIn, make a search and set your preferences within the extension’s settings panel. You can specify the number of interactions you’d like to perform. The extension also provides flexible configuration options, allowing you to choose between different types of actions (such as reactions or comments) and select the identities to use for multi-account users.

The extension includes usage tracking and history, enabling you to monitor your interactions, view your remaining actions within your plan, and access performance insights. You can also customize interaction limits based on your subscription, which refreshes automatically, ensuring you stay within safe engagement levels.

This extension is perfect for professionals and businesses aiming to establish a strong LinkedIn presence by consistently engaging with relevant posts, boosting visibility, and building stronger connections without needing to be online all day.

This extension is actively developed. Stay tuned for updates.
